post.text: We spent $6 trillion in the Middle East. We could have rebuilt our country twice!

comment.author: Declan
comment.text: It is so obvious that Hillary has been given the questions beforehand and is well rehearsed. I'm beginning to really understand Trump and his sense of urgency for Our National Situation.

replies.author: Shay
replies.text: She is clearly too well prepared Holt has a clear bias idc if he is a republican

replies.author: Rachael
replies.text: She kept looking down like she was reading her answers

replies.author: Tristin
replies.text: Rachael Yes, and I also had the impression she had learnt a lot by heart.

replies.author: Trevor
replies.text: Madam President was prepared. Unlike the orange menace who showed his childish incompetent sniffing blathering self.
